title: Facebook automatically shares your data with many other services

tosdr.case: many third parties are involved in operating the service
tosdr.tldr: Facebook automatically shares your information with companies like Bing, Pandora, TripAdvisor, Yelp, Rotten Tomatoes, Clicker, Scribd, and Docs, unless you manually opt-out.
